node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `ebug` ( `ebug_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `assigned_to` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` enum('none','open','closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none', `resolution` enum('none','assigned','active','fixed','invalid','later','works for me','duplicate') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none', `severity` enum('none','huge','big','medium','minor','nitpick','suggestion') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none', `category` enum('none','server','display','wording') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none', `errorlocation` enum('none','web server','Perl module','htmlcode','superdoc','HTML','XML','theme','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none', `priority` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `theme` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `useragentname` varchar(7) DEFAULT NULL, `useragentos` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `useragentversion` varchar(7) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ebug_id`), KEY `assigned_to` (`assigned_to`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `priority` (`priority`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: ebug
